rescuecore2.score

Class UnaryOperatorScoreFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.score.AbstractScoreFunction
      • rescuecore2.score.DelegatingScoreFunction
        • rescuecore2.score.UnaryOperatorScoreFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreFunction

    public class UnaryOperatorScoreFunction
extends DelegatingScoreFunction
    A score function that performs a unary operation on a child score function.
